text: No, No, No is the debut album by a Jamaican reggae singer Dawn Penn, released in 1994. The album was released nearly 30 years after Penn embarked on a recording career, following up the worldwide success of her single "You Don't Love Me (No, No, No)". The album, however, was met with a modest chart success. ==Track listing== #"I Want a Love I Can See" (Smokey Robinson) \- 3:54 #"I'm Sorry" (Clive Hunt, Dawn Penn, Dylan Powe) \- 4:10 #"You Don't Love Me (No, No, No)" (Extended Mix) (Dawn Penn) \- 4:37 #"Night and Day" (Horace Swaby) \- 4:55 #"My Love Takes Over" (Clive Hunt, Dawn Penn, Dylan Powe) \- 3:57 #"The First Cut Is the Deepest" (Cat Stevens) \- 4:27 #"I'll Do It Again" (Dwight Pinkney) \- 4:05 #"Hurt" (Dawn Penn) \- 3:57 #"Samfi Boy" (Bobby Digital, Dawn Penn, Geoffrey Chung) \- 5:09 #"Keep in Touch" (Chin/Fook, Geoffrey Chung, Rupert Cunningham) \- 4:30 #"My Man" (Clevie Brownie, Nadine Sutherland) \- 3:58 #"Blue Yes Blue" (Dawn Penn) \- 4:52 #"You Don't Love Me (No, No, No)" (Remix) (Dawn Penn) \- 5:13 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart !Peak position |- |Austrian Albums Chart |align="center"|25 |- |German Albums Chart |align="center"|53 |- |UK Albums Chart |align="center"|51 |- |US R&B; Albums |align="center"|83 |- |US Top Reggae Albums |align="center"|5 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * No, No, No at Discogs * No, No, No at Rate Your Music Category:1994 debut albums Category:Dawn Penn albums Category:Albums produced by Craig Kallman Category:Big Beat Records (American record label) albums Category:Gospel albums by Jamaican artists
